item.title: Poetry and Direnv
item.description: Background I end up writing about using poetry a lot I almost always use direnv in real life too I don’t keep writing mini scripts in my .envrc Honestly there’s nothing here anyone using the direnv wiki will find surprising, but then it is still neat to link back to. Setting Up Poetry This essentially works by simply modifying the global .direnvrc which essentially gets sourced by every local .
